articles.description: A total of 14 British players, including Emma Raducanu, feature on day one of Wimbledon, with Carlos Alcaraz also beginning his title defence.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 LIVE: Alcaraz, Raducanu & Sabalenka play - watch stream, order of play, scores & updates

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz avoids a seismic shock against Italian veteran Fabio Fognini to set up a Wimbledon second-round meeting with British qualifier Oliver Tarvet.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Carlos Alcaraz beats Fabio Fognini to set up Oliver Tarvet match

articles.description: Brentford director of football Phil Giles says the club will only sell Bryan Mbeumo if the "deal is right" - and they have not ruled out the forward staying.
articles.title: Bryan Mbeumo might stay at Brentford amidst Man City interest say club

articles.description: Players, staff and spectators contend with sweltering conditions as Wimbledon records the hottest opening day in the tournament's history.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Hottest ever opening day sees players using ice to keep cool at SW19

articles.description: England name an unchanged team for the second Test against India at Edgbaston, meaning a further wait for the return of Jofra Archer.
articles.title: England vs India: No Jofra Archer for hosts in unchanged team

articles.description: Sonay Kartal becomes the first of the British contingent to progress on day one at Wimbledon with victory over 20th seed Jelena Ostapenko.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Sonay Kartal gets British women off to winning start

articles.description: Toulon scrum-half Ben White admits "I haven't stopped shaking" after being called up as an injury replacement for the British and Irish Lions just as he was preparing to play for Scotland on Saturday.
articles.title: Ben White 'hasn't stopped shaking' since late British and Irish Lions call-up

articles.description: Two-time semi-finalist Daniil Medvedev suffers a shock first-round exit against 64th-ranked Frenchman Benjamin Bonzi at Wimbledon.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Daniil Medvedev suffers shock first-round exit

articles.description: Uefa delays a decision on whether Crystal Palace can compete in next season's Europa League.
articles.title: Crystal Palace: Uefa delays decision on club's Europa League fate

articles.description: Ben Askren was admitted to hospital last month with pneumonia.
articles.title: UFC: Ben Askren receives double lung transplant, his wife announces
